Simply Earth: Thanks for sending the screenshot! It looks like your account is still flagged as a wholesale account, which is why you're seeing the $100 minimum order requirement. To purchase the Big Bonus Box at the regular $47 price, you'll need to switch back to a retail account. 

The best way to handle this is to email us directly at help@simplyearth.com. Our team is happy to help! Once your account is switched, you'll be able to order without the wholesale minimum.

escalate: Esc inquiries about items not on the site
ESC if the cx missed a sale & wants to take advantage of it
ESC if the customer is asking for a discount and we don't have one
If cx is looking for general recommendations use LFR shortcut and ESC
templates: If cx is building a new home, interested in refurnishing their entire home or rooms in their home, use the IDS shortcut
If cx is shopping for a client use SFC shortcut
Any convo without a positive outcome (out of stock, not on sale, not shipping in time), use DSS shortcut
dos_and_donts: For product-specific delivery time-frame inquiries always check the product page for delivery info and share that with the cx
